nodes.text: Rolettan was a male creature native to Protobranch. Rolettan was described as having four nostrils, thick scarlet scales, six legs, and a clubbed tail by a young Dooku on a mercy mission to Protobranch. A solar storm hit the planet while Rolettan was giving birth, causing Rolettan to surface near the wreckage of the Tabor Hospital. Rolettan carried the Jedi Dooku and Sifo-Dyas to safety, while a group of survivors from the hospital rode on the back of his baby.
